content: Stocks Bonds Equities Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 17 Mar 2019Is Equity/or Bonds the same as holding a stock for a long time? ?1 answerAnswerBump0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 17 Mar 2019Equity is stock and it is shares issued by a company. Bonds are like loans to a company. You dont need to hold them for a long time. It depends on your investment strategy. Sorry your question is phrased a bit weirdly, so im not sure if i answered what you are asking.0 comments0
